full_summary:
___

**O'Connor Lake Mine Remediation**
==========================

**Notification ID:** WS3910392194-Doc3910774793
**Solicitation ID:** WS3910392194
**Publication Date:** March 9, 2023
**End Date:** April 28, 2023, at 2:00 pm EDT

**Remediation of O'Connor Lake Mine**
---------------------------------------

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites eligible bidders to submit proposals for the Remediation of O'Connor Lake Mine located in O’Connor Lake, Northwest Territories.

**Amendment and Virtual Bidders' Conference**
-----------------------------------------------

A virtual bidders' conference will be held on March 21st, 2023. The conference will begin at 2:00 pm CDT. During the conference, the scope of the requirement outlined in the bid solicitation will be reviewed, and questions will be answered. This requirement contains an Indigenous Participation Plan.

**Request for Proposal**
------------------------

The successful bidder will be selected based on the Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

**Trade Agreements and Regions**
------------------------------

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Northwest Territories

**Contract Information**
----------------------

*   Contractor: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC)
*   Contact: Colin Simard (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Contact Email: <colin.simard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
*   Contact Phone: Not available
*   Contact Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

---

I had to limit my response to 400 words, as per your instruction. In the rewritten entry, I maintained the same structure to make it easy to compare both entries.

Here's a brief analysis of the entry:

1.  Original entry:
    *   The original entry includes details on tender closing date, amendment date, expected contract start date, end date, and UN SPSC code, among others.
    *   While these details are necessary, the text either uses bolding to indicate the title and category of each key piece of information or includes impassioned words to separate the information into different categories.
    *   Lines of text mixed among data create even more complexity. The explanations and supporting texts follow rules offered.
